structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. DOMESTIC PARTNERS AND FAMILY HEALTH COVERAGE

text.section:
Sec. 11A-79. Enforcement.
County employees who believe the County has violated any right established by this ordinance shall have the right to file a complaint with the Office of Fair Employment Practices in accordance with and the rules promulgated by that Office. The terms of this ordinance may be enforced by persons other than County employees, and by County employees against private businesses, through the filing of a private action in any court of competent jurisdiction for declaratory or injunctive relief or both.
